Title: Suspense, disillusion as Fubara fails to show up after emergency rule ends
Summary: Rivers State’s return to democracy ended in suspense yesterday . Governor Siminalayi Fubara failed to resume office after emergency rule ends . Jubilant supporters disillusioned .

Title: Osun PDP wants suspicious letters on LG funds’ case probed
Summary: Osun State chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has called on the Chief Judge of the Federal High Court to probe the circumstances surrounding a controversial letter dated September 2, 2014 .

Title: Aiyedatiwa hails Supreme Court judgment on victory
Summary: Ondo State Governor, Lucky Aiyedatiwa, vows to focus on governance of the state . Agboola Ajayi withdrew his appeal at the Supreme Court to withdraw his appeal . The candidate of the PDP candidate in the November 16, 2024, governorship election, Agbool Ajaye, has withdrawn his

Title: Ogun community decries state govt’s stoppage of federal road intervention project
Summary: Residents of Sagamu have chided the Ogun State government for allegedly stopping an ongoing Federal Government road project . The project was approved under President Bola Tinubu's administration .

Title: Brain drain: Exhausted doctors, long wait times test public hospitals’ care capacity
Summary: The growing exodus of doctors has pushed Nigeria’s health system to a breaking point, bequeathing to it pathetic legacies, including severe staffing shortages, horrible conditions of service and burnout .

Title: Flood alert: FG raises fresh alarm as Rivers Niger, Benue reach peak level
Summary: Nigeria Hydrological Services Agency, NiHSA, yesterday, warned that Rivers Niger and Benue have reached their peak, therefore, posing threat to Nigerians living in the areas .

Title: Dollar to Naira black market exchange rate today
Summary: The naira traded weaker against the United States dollar in the parallel market on Thursday, exchanging at ₦1,530/$1 for those buying and � 1,520/$1 .

Title: I have no plans to recommend commissioners  —  Wike promises to give Fubara free hand
Summary: Wike says his only concern is that Fubara sustains the progress he left behind as governor of Rivers State . Wike has no plans to recommend commissioners .

Title: Nigerian man charged after hacking US varsity systems to steal $235,000
Summary: Nigerian citizen living in the UK, Farouk Adekunle Adepoju has been arrested following a U.S. request for extradition on charges of wire fraud and computer fraud .

Title: Ajaokuta Steel Company in good shape, says FG
Summary: Ajaokuta Steel Company is in good shape, says the Federal Government . This was contained in a statement signed by the Head, Press and Public Relations Department, Salamatu Jibaniya .
